OnAdminGained.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! VORTEX JOINED THE SERVER @channel
Greetings Vortex, our external agent confirmed that you deserve a place among us
I am leader of NightHawks, there are five of us total, not counting external agents
Jenkins, our Technical Specialist, he can easily make one computer attack another one without anybody noticing anything
Sup
Deladello, Social Engineering, utilizes human stupidity better than anyone else
Greetings
Prophet, Coordinator and Cooperative Hacker, helps me to hold everything under control, and if you pair with him, nobody can stop you both
When united - then strong
Slayer, Damage Control, our blast force and sledgehammer in any situation, has access to the hitmen services in special cases
Need anything or anyone broken, you ask me
And me of course, Head of The Operations, Maverick
You are here because you have proven yourself as a resourceful hacker and we need people like you
And my guess is that you want something from us as well
I need to find one hacker
Deladello and Prophet can help you with that
But why I should give them that order?
I can be a part of your team as well, you still need the Covert Operations specialist, someone untrackable, I bet you already know why I am the best candidate
Indeed, your log-disguise is a very interesting phenomenon
We have a few contracts that require delicate approach
While you will be busy with them, Deladello and Prophet will collect info about your guy
You accept that deal?
Yes
Boys, help our new member with his personal problem and give his address to our contracts hub agent
Jenkins, Slayer, we have a business to attend to
What is the nickname of that hacker?
Omicron
We'll start digging, meanwhile you will complete contracts of our clients, first one should be easy
And check this server's files, you can find something useful
Here is your first one
